Partner essentials FEATURED
Virtual care continues to evolve
To help guide your clients through their virtual care adoption journey, Teladoc Health developed a Whole-Person Virtual Care Transformation Model. This tool leverages our vast experience and provides insight for your clients into the essential components of a robust virtual care strategy. Providing a benchmark for employers of all sizes and industries can help guide your clients to achieve their organizational goals.
